embeddedItem.name: Tasty Field Nutrient Bar
embeddedItem.desc: Upon use, Max HP of all allies increases by <nobr>14%</nobr> plus an extra <nobr>360</nobr> for the next battle.
embeddedItem.lore:
The wars between Cloud Knights and Denizens of Abundance can last for a long time, even across several Amber Eras. The Cloud Knights tend to spend a long time in garrisons and invented many tasty foods for field consumption. The Field Nutrient Bar is easy to carry and particularly sought-after by the troops.
The nutrient bar tastes like smoked meat with notes of honey and candy.

"Mix peanuts with dried bean curds and wrap with ambergris. Has a nutty flavor to it."

29328.name: Credit
29328.desc: This currency, used by the Interastral Peace Corporation to settle accounts with its customers, is now widely accepted as the hard currency for space travel.
29328.lore: "People run around fighting and trading for numbers in a terminal, but the truly precious cannot be bought."

72753.name: Recipe: Tasty Field Nutrient Bar
72753.desc: A simple equation. When entered into the Synthesizer, it will unlock a new recipe.

641099.name: Protein Rice
641099.lore:
Nature's gift to human society, friend of mankind, savior of lives.
Smooth as egg white and full of protein.

"Every grain costs sweat and blood."
comeFrom: Storage Zone: Voidranger: Reavers or other enemies
Found in destructible objects in the Herta Space Station

757647.name: Basic Ingredients
757647.lore:
Ingredients that keep you fed but taste less than ideal.
Not particularly good, but keep you fed.

"Can I eat it? Is it good? What do I eat it with?"
comeFrom: Found in destructible objects in the Herta Space Station

757713.name: Ambergris of Abundance
757713.lore:
Jelly-like substance that contains the power of Abundance.
Firm but not stiff, with notes of fragrance, it fills your heart with hope the moment it touches your fingertip.
Do not ask what it's made of.

"It gives you longevity and abundance, dispelling misfortune and illness."
comeFrom: Cloudford: Mara-Struck Soldiers or other enemies
